name: roll
chn: vt. & vi. 使…成球状 (或管状); n. 卷, 卷轴
example_en: She rolled the dough into a ball.
example_cn: 她把面团揉成了一个球。
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'rollian'，意为滚动或卷起。联想记忆：想象一个面包师正在滚动面团，或者一卷纸从桌子上滚下来。图像记忆：想象一个卷轴在桌子上滚动，或者一个球在地面上滚动。

image_prompt.main_image: A baker rolling dough into a ball on a floured surface, with a rolling pin nearby.
image_prompt.example_image: A close-up of hands rolling dough into a perfect ball, with a kitchen background.

collocations: roll the dice (掷骰子); roll out the carpet (铺开地毯); roll call (点名)
